actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-77.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 595) to authorize the Administrator of General Services to dispose of thirty-five thousand long tons of tin in the national and supplemental stockpiles, and to provide for the deposit of moneys received from the sale of such tin.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 595 (Tin disposal, supplemental stockpiles).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 595) to authorize the Administrator of General Services to dispose of thirty-five thousand long tons of tin in the national and supplemental stockpiles, and to provide for the deposit of moneys received from the sale of such tin.
